mapper.select: SELECT alba.alba_id AS albaId, work.work_id AS workId, work.work_status AS workStatus, work.work_date AS workDate, alba.alba_name AS albaName, alba.alba_phone AS albaPhone, alba.alba_status AS albaStatus FROM alba LEFT JOIN work ON alba.alba_id = work.alba_id WHERE alba.store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY alba.alba_id DESC
SELECT alba_id AS albaId, store_id AS storeId, alba_name AS albaName, alba_phone AS albaPhone, alba_status AS albaStatus FROM alba WHERE alba_id = #{albaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alba (store_id, alba_name, alba_phone, alba_status) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{albaName}, #{albaPhone}, #{albaStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE alba SET store_id = #{storeId}, alba_name = #{albaName}, alba_phone = #{albaPhone}, alba_status = #{albaStatus} WHERE alba_id = #{albaId}
